instructions: Tap the Albums tab, then tap the Places album. Select Map or Grid view. Only pictures and videos that have embedded location information (GPS data) are included. Tip: Zoom in and drag the map to see more specific locations.
Open a photo, then swipe up to see the photo details. Swipe up to view Places, then tap the location s name or address.
Tap a photo to view it in full screen. (The photo must contain location information.) Swipe up to view Places. Tap Show Nearby Photos.
In the Albums tab, tap the Places album. Tap Grid. Find a location with several images, then tap the header, marked with the arrow symbol . Tap the Play button .
While playing video content, tap the Media Selection button . Choose from the list of available subtitles and captions.

Go to Settings > General > Accessibility > Subtitles & Captioning. If you prefer closed captioning or subtitles for the deaf and hard of hearing when available, turn on Closed Captions + SDH. Tap Style, then choose an existing caption style or create a new style based on the following: Font, size, and color Background color and opacity Text opacity, edge style, and highlight
Tap the Home tab, then tap the Add button . Tap Add Accessory, then follow the onscreen instructions. When you add an accessory, it s assigned to a default room, or a room you choose.

Tap Rooms, tap the Show Rooms button , then choose the room the accessory is currently assigned to. If it s not already assigned, look in Default Room. Touch and hold the accessory s button, then swipe up on the screen or tap the Settings button . Tap Room, then choose a room. Turn on Include in Favorites to add the accessory to the Home tab. To rearrange your favorites, tap the Home tab, tap Edit, then drag the buttons into the arrangement you want.
Tap Rooms, then tap the Show Rooms button . Tap Room Settings, then tap a room. Tap Zone, then tap an existing zone, or tap Create New to add the room to a new zone.
Tap Rooms, then tap the Show Rooms button . Tap Room Settings, then tap a room.

Open WhatsApp on your iPhone and tap the Settings icon at the bottom of the screen. From Settings , tap Account > Privacy . In the Privacy settings, tap Last Seen, then choose Nobody for your Last Seen setting to turn Last Seen off. This means nobody will be able to view your last seen time.

Open WhatsApp on your Android and tap the three vertical dots at the top right corner of the screen to access the menu. From the menu, tap Settings , then tap Account . From the Account screen, tap Privacy , then tap Last seen . Next, choose Nobody for your Last Seen setting. This means nobody will be able to view your last seen time.
